comments: She keeps the lectures quite interesting even though they tend to be long, and the course material is not hard as long as you pay attention. Easy A as long as you show up to class. Two minor papers and one major research paper. She\'s a very easy professor to talk to and is generally very understanding. Definitely recommend her!

comments: We watch a lot of movies in class which is nice. Lectures, when we had them, were pretty boring, especially with the class being almost 2 hours long... Tests are based on lectures/powerpoints - but pretty difficult, so be ready to study. 4 tests throughout the semester. Final paper is a little extraneous but manageable.

comments: She is the worst teacher I have ever had. She makes you stay after you take the test to watch movies. She weighs the tests really heavy so if you fail you drop 5%. Avoid her at all costs.

stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: She seemed to be helpful with lining out details, but ended up being very misleading. She provided an outline example for a research paper and then docked me 30 points for using the example that was actually outdated. She then refused to give me points back as it would be "unfair" to my classmates. Don\'t recommend taking her as you can\'t trust her.

stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  AMAZING LECTURES  TEST HEAVY
comments: In her into to motion pictures you will have a research paper and three small papers. There are four exams and you MUST study. If you study they are not that bad. There are short quizzes after each movie that are pretty easy. This class is fun and the teacher is very helpful and nice, but it is a lot of work so don\'t assume it\'s an easy A.

comments: I loved her. She is a graduate student who teaches courses so she is young and has a spunky personality. Her tests were reasonably easy because she thoroughly goes in depth during notes and makes the topics very easy to comprehend. The speeches are the hardest part about this class and I did not struggle with them at all. She is a very easy grader.

comments: The classes are LONG, and sometimes she will lecture for the entire two hours. There are quizzes after each of the movies watched in class, but they are easy. The test are pretty tough. She assigns 2 page journals for some of the movies (you need the book for these - citations), and there is a 5-7 page research paper near the end of the semester.

comments: She\'s a great teacher, I advise, however, that you take her Intro to Motion Pictures class seriously. She goes over material quickly, so you must be paying attention. The quizzes over the movies you watch are easy, but the tests are no joke. If you want a decent grade in that class, you need to study for those! Other than that, no major complaints.
